name: Party Like it's 2078
description:
Description
===========
You're a party lover robot, and you've got sneak into the coolest party in town. But it's not enough for you. Your goal is to get into the VIP zone.

Controls
========
WASD/Arrow Keys to move, space to attack, Return/Enter to talk and E to shapeshift.

Objective
=========
You need to shapeshift so they let you on to the VIP zone

Created for the Ludum Dare 35
